task_description:
# Soul Currency & Economy

Implement souls as the primary currency earned from slicing monsters, used for weapon purchases and upgrades.

## Rationale
Earning currency through gameplay (not IAPs) addresses competitor pain points about pay-to-win mechanics (pain-1-2, pain-4-1). Fair progression without monetization barriers.

## User Stories
- As a player, I want to earn currency through gameplay so that I can unlock upgrades without paying

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Souls awarded per monster based on type and combo
- [ ] Total souls displayed in HUD and menus
- [ ] Souls persist between sessions
- [ ] Level completion bonus souls awarded
- [ ] Souls deducted on purchases with confirmation
